nodes.bodyText: i think it doesn't work like this..maybe you can clarify with teo..at any rate, i believe the M_ShipperTransportation_ID won't make it into the error message

nodes.bodyText:
as written further-up; i think thise does not add the M_ShipperTransportation_ID to the error message.
what i had in mind is ....appendParametersToMessage().setParameter("M_ShipperTransportation_ID", p_M_ShipperTransportation.getM_ShipperTransportation_ID())
